body: Your desire to see and experience the world overrides healthy caution.
name: Fearless Curiosity
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/New Racial Rules/Human Feats/Fearless Curiosity

sections.body: You gain a +1 bonus on saving throws against effects with the emotion descriptor. In addition, for any round in which you begin your turn affected by a fear effect, you gain a new save at the beginning of your turn to reduce the severity of the fear effect, from panicked to frightened, frightened to shaken, and shaken to unaffected.
sections.name: Benefit
